Paragraph: CPDT was first introduced into the low band gap polymers , and the corresponding copolymer alternating CPDT with benzothiadiazole showed a PCE of 5.5% , after using a small amount of alkanedithiols to control the morphology of the blend film.

Let's think step by step.

| alkanedithiols

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: CPDT was first introduced into the low band gap polymers , and the corresponding copolymer alternating CPDT with benzothiadiazole showed a PCE of 5.5% , after using a small amount of alkanedithiols to control the morphology of the blend film.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band gap polymers |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| 5.5% |
| corresponding copolymer |
| alternating CPDT (Chemically Purified Donor-Acceptor Thiophene-Thienothiophene) |
| benzothiadiazole |
| blend film |
| morphology |
| small amount of alkanedithiols |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band gap polymers |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| 5.5% |
| morphology of the blend film |
| small amount of alkanedithiols |

Note: "corresponding copolymer" and "alternating CPDT" can be considered material properties as they refer to specific types of polymers. However, "CPDT" is a chemical compound and not a property, so it has been removed. Similarly, "first introduced into" and "showed" are not material properties and have been removed.
